title: Type Camp
content:
Hi,

just wanted to let you all know about Type Camp; Type Camp conducts seminars and workshops aimed at enriching the typographic- and design-related knowledge of students, amateurs, and professionals. All events take place in a variety of countries worldwide and are led by some of the foremost typographers in the industry.

The next event, Type Camp Galiano is taking place on Galiano Island BC from August 12-17. Instructors include Marian Bantjes, Shelley Gruendler and Ross Mills. Visit [www.typecamp.org](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417083615/http:/www.typecamp.org/ "www.typecamp.org") for more information.

Hope to see you there!
author: MissK
